steps: Shutdown computer properly and unplug power cord
Wait 30 seconds for internal components to discharge
Remove thumb screws or side panel screws
Slide or swing open side panel to access internals
Ground yourself with anti-static wrist strap
Locate component that needs service or replacement
Disconnect power and data cables from target component
Remove any mounting brackets or screws
Carefully extract component from bay or slot
Insert replacement component ensuring proper connection
Secure component with mounting screws or brackets
Reconnect all necessary power and data cables
Close side panel and secure with screws
Reconnect power cord and test system operation
warnings: Business computers may have warranty seals - check before opening
Use anti-static protection to prevent component damage
Some components may require specific HP-certified parts
Hard drives contain sensitive data - handle with care
Ensure adequate ventilation after component changes
Test system thoroughly after any modifications
